tasks.task: Performing mob grazing and evaluating its effects on stocking density, utilization, and land management.
subtasks: Assessing live weights and grass cover before and after livestock movement.
Monitoring animal performance and utilization rates in different rainfall zones.
Documenting soil health and organic matter accumulation through trampling and vegetation management.
Comparing traditional rotational grazing with mob grazing methods for harvest efficiency and animal nutrition.
Implementing adaptive management strategies based on seasonal conditions and environmental factors.
Collecting data on stock density, grass consumption, and trampling to determine optimal grazing frequency.
Educating producers on the benefits and challenges of high-density mob grazing for sustainable land use.
